overview: Mr. Ron Mackintosh has served as a non-executive director since May 2004 and was appointed Chairman with effect from 2 May 2007. Mr Mackintosh is a non-executive director of the software company Fidessa Group plc. Mr Mackintosh has held a number of senior executive positions in European technology companies. Between 1992 and 2000, Mr Mackintosh was Chief Executive of Computer Sciences Corporationâ€™s (CSC) European business, which had revenues of $2.5 billion. He is also a former director of Gemplus SA and is the former chairman of Smartstream Technologies Ltd, Northgate Information Solutions plc, and Differentis, a privately owned IT consultancy which he co-founded in July 2000. Mr Mackintosh is Chairman of the Nomination Committee and a member of the Remuneration Committee.
